channel.title: How do I make an item disappear on death?
channel.description:
How do I make items disappear on death?
I have
[code]} else if deathStage == 2) { removeAllItems();[/code]
But I only want it to remove the donator items when they die so non donators dont get them.

item.title: How do I make an item disappear on death?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

I did.
But if someone wields it with a full inventory it wont remove it from them.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make an item disappear on death?
